actions.committee: House Committee on the District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the District of Columbia.

official_title: A bill to quitclaim certain property in the city of Washington, District of Columbia, to the Little Sisters of the Poor.

summary.text: Transfers all interest and title of the United States to a specified property in the District of Columbia to the Little Sisters of the Poor.

titles.title: A bill to quitclaim certain property in the city of Washington, District of Columbia, to the Little Sisters of the Poor.
